name: Ninja Squirrel
description:
MI 445 Project 1 

Modifications:

1.  Redesigned to the open world level

2. Created original Art for the Menu UI to create an aesthetic theme.

3. Modeling and Textured new assets, such as cherry blossom trees and Tori Gate.

4. created new floor textures and replaced the nut projectile with a ninja star to add to the aesthetic.

5. Modeling created a new dojo environment for the combat level.
